include(ExternalProject)

SET( CVM_DEPENDENCIES )

include(zlib.cmake)
LIST(APPEND CVM_DEPENDENCIES ${ZLIB_PROJECT})
include(fastahack.cmake)
LIST(APPEND CVM_DEPENDENCIES ${FASTAHACK_PROJECT})
include(cxxopts.cmake)
LIST(APPEND CVM_DEPENDENCIES ${CXXOPTS_PROJECT})

SET(CVM_SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/external CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)

SET(CVM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/externals/cvm_external_project CACHE INTERNAL "external project directory")
SET(CVM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT cvm_external_project CACHE INTERNAL "all cvm external projects")
ExternalProject_Add(${CVM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}
    DEPENDS ${CVM_DEPENDENCIES}
    DOWNLOAD_COMMAND ""
	SOURCE_DIR ${CVM_SOURCE_DIR}
	BINARY_DIR ${CVM_EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/bin
	INSTALL_COMMAND ""
    UPDATE_COMMAND ""
	CMAKE_CACHE_ARGS
        -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER:STRING=${CMAKE_C_COMPILER}
        -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER:STRING=${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER}
)
